name: Gyro Gear
description:
Fight other competitors and try to make them stop spinning or throw them out of the arena. You have only 3 lives to win before your opponent's lives runs out.

After the qualifiers and before the semi-finals you'll be given a chance to race against a tough competitor. Get 3 flags before them to win and unlock new outfits.

Attack at the right time to deflect damage and jump across the stage to get an advantage point. Figure out how to deal with each character and you'll succeed! To review the controls, press Enter or the Pause icon.

Tournament features:

  • Play as 8 characters with different attributes and abilities;
  • 8 arenas and 2 tracks to battle it out;
  • Each character has a unique secret passive ability;
  • Platform fighter with unique vehicles and physics;
  • Unlock new characters and costumes.

The game doesn't end here. I'm developing a 2 player VS game and I have plans for a Story and even a Gyro customizer in the future. They'll be released as separate releases instead of updates.

Follow me to keep up to date!
